author: Jax & Jackson
name: Minion Panic
bootlegger: Each night*, Minions choose a player: they die. In case of a tie, the kill is arbitrary. If there are less than 2 evil players alive, good wins. If two or more minions are alive and there are three or fewer players alive, evil wins. If there are two minions alive after final four, evil wins. [No Demon. +1 Minion]

jinxes.reason: When the Puzzlemaster makes a guess; if they would learn the demon, they instead learn a living minion
The Minion Panic kill at night counts as a Demon kill to the Lycanthrope.
One minion learns that a king is in play.
